sentences.sentence: Objective:To Observe the febrifuge effect of antivirus capsule.
sentences.translation: 目的观察安替威胶囊的解热作用。

sentences.sentence: Objective: to observe the validity and security of ibuprofen suspension in treating enfant fever heat of infection, thence provide reference to help choose oral febrifuge in clinic.
sentences.translation: 目的：了解布洛芬混悬液(美林)治疗儿童感染性发热的有效性和安全性，为临床选择口服退热药提供参考。
